definition[0]: a small flat board with a clip on top that holds paper so that you can write on it
definition[1]: a part of a computerâ€™s memory that stores information when you are moving it from one document to another
definition[2]: a small flat board with a piece of metal or plastic on top for holding pieces of paper so that you can write on them
definition[3]: a part of a computer memory that stores sections of text while you move them from one part of a document to another, or to another document
